file_content.text: Activity finder has found a match for your group. Would you like to join?
Activity Finder
A potential group member has declined the invite. You will be placed at the top of the activity finder queue.
Your activity finder invite has expired. You have been removed from the queue.
A potential group member did not respond to the activity finder invitation. You will be placed at the top of the activity finder queue.

A shuttle to your destination is available.
Would you like to travel now?
The activity finder invitation has expired. Your group has been removed from the queue.
A group member did not respond to the activity finder invitation. Your group has been removed from the queue.
You declined the activity finder invitation and have been removed from the queue.
You have declined the activity finder invitation for your group. Your group has been removed from the activity finder queue.
A group member has declined the activity finder invitation. Your group has been removed from the queue.
Your group has been removed from the activity finder queue.
You are no longer in the activity finder queue.
Your group has been added to the activity finder queue.
You have been added to the activity finder queue.
You are ineligible for the selected activity finder destination.
Your group is ineligible for the selected activity finder destination.
You cannot enter the queue while your group is actively progressing through your current location.
Your group cannot enter or leave the queue while there are outstanding group member invites.
Flashpoints
Operations
Flashpoints
Planetary Destination
Currently unable to join the activity finder queue.
Your group is not valid for the selected destination.

A shuttle to your destination is available.
Would you like to travel now?
You have completed the location matched through activity finder.
The activity finder destination is available.
A group has been matched to your selected destination.
You may not enter the activity finder queue because you have the maximum number of allowed missions in your mission log.
Heal
Damage
Tank
You may not enter the activity finder queue while group members are offline.
A member has abandoned your group. As group leader, you can re-queue your group and quickly replace the lost group member.
A potential group member was offline when the activity finder group was ready to begin. You have been returned to the activity finder queue at your previous position.
A group member was offline when the activity finder destination was ready. Your group has been removed from the queue.
You currently have an active phase and may not queue for activity finder until it is reset. You can reset your active phases from your portrait menu.
Master Mode Flashpoints
You have left a group while it was in-progress and have been locked out of activity finder . You may not queue again until your lockout timer expires.
You have not been added to the activity finder queue.
Your group has not been added to the activity finder queue.
Your group member <<1>> has a full mission log. You may not queue for a activity finder destination while the mission log is full.
Your group member <<1>> is ineligible for this location: <<1>>.
You are ineligible for this location: <<1>>.
Your group member <<1>> is locked out of activity finder for leaving. The group cannot queue until the lock out expires or the group member leaves the group.
You have left a group while it was in-progress and have been locked out of activity finder. You may not queue again until your lock out timer expires.
[MASTER]
Your group has been placed into the activity finder queue to find replacement players. Your group is in queue at a higher priority.
Your activity finder role is now set to:
Your activity finder roles are now set to:
You are ineligible for this selection.

You have conflicting missions for this destination: <<1>>. Activity Finder can remove the conflict so that you may queue for the selected destination.
Note: Any removed mission can be obtained from the original mission giver.
Travel Now
Travel Later
The shuttle to your destination can be accessed at any time by clicking on the activity finder button.
Shuttle to <<1>> is now available. Selected Role: <<2>>
Your group member <<1>> is in a warzone. You may not enter the activity finder queue.
You may not enter the activity finder queue while in a warzone.
A shuttle to your destination is available.You may travel when combat has ended.
Activity Finder is searching for a replacement group member.
Your position in the activity finder queue is paused while a groupmate is disconnected.
Your position in the activity finder queue is no longer paused.
Your position in the activity finder queue is no longer paused.
FLASHPOINT
You may not invite another player to your group while you are in a activity finder queue. Please leave the queue to invite someone to your group.
You may not convert your group to an Operations group while in a activity finder queue. Please leave the queue to convert to an Operations group.
The player you are trying to invite is currently in the activity finder queue. Please ask them to leave the activity finder queue and then send the invitation again.
You may not invite players to join a groupfinder formed group.
If you leave the queue, you will be unable to search for a replacement. To find a replacement you will need to enter the queue for a new version of your destination.
You have left the groupfinder destination. You may return to the destination quickly via the groupfinder button.
Exiting Activity Finder Destination
You are leaving the Activity Finder destination. Would you like to return to your previous location, or to the exit location for the destination?
Previous Location
Exit Location
You may not travel while in combat.
You cannot accept an invite to an ops group while in this region.
One of the potential group members was restricted from joining the ops group. You have been returned to the activity finder queue.
You could not join an ops group in your current region. You have been removed from the activity finder queue.
Travel to your selected destination has failed, please try again. If you continue to have difficulties, please rejoin the Activity Finder queue.
Flashpoints
Veteran Mode Flashpoints are action-packed, role-neutral instances balanced for a group of four players. Players below the maximum level will be bolstered to the appropriate power level.
Cannot enter queue because you have the maximum number of allowed pending mission rewards.
Your group member <<1>> is at the pending mission rewards cap . You may not queue for the activity finder destination while at the pending mission rewards cap.
[VETERAN] Flashpoint
[MASTER] Flashpoint
[VETERAN] Uprising
[STORY] Uprising
[MASTER] Uprising
<<1>>: Requires Item Rating <<2>>
